headerStory: In a time when antisemitism is once again on the rise, silence is not an option. MagenTravel is a community-driven platform that ensures every Jew can travel safely — anywhere in the world.

features.title: Real-Time Ratings
features.text: Users can rate places, drivers, restaurants, or hotels based on how Jewish-friendly they are. These insights help you choose where to stay, eat, or visit with confidence. Crowd-sourced data ensures you always know what to expect — whether you're booking a cab or selecting a neighborhood to explore.

features.title: Live Field Reports
features.text: Field reports shared by the community help surface incidents and share local knowledge. Whether it's an uncomfortable experience, a welcoming host, or a nearby synagogue — the community learns from each other in real time. Reports are geotagged and categorized for easy access on the map.

features.title: Location-Based Alerts
features.text: When someone nearby reports a dangerous incident or antisemitic activity, you'll get notified instantly. Alerts come with location, report details, and resources for help — ensuring you can respond, avoid risk, or support others in need. It's proactive travel safety in your pocket.

features.title: Live Chats
features.text: Connect instantly with other Jewish travelers nearby through live chats. Whether it's for coordinating a minyan, sharing a ride, warning about an incident, or asking for kosher food tips — real-time communication enables safety, community, and mutual support across borders.
